posts.post_content:
I have this duplicate and would like to trade it for another PSA-5 T206.  Please let me know what you have for trade.

The card has a clean Piedmont 350 back, and in case the scan appears dull or fuzzy, please be assured that the focus and registration on this card is crisp.  It's a nice card.

You can PM me or send an email to [url]mackeyd@mailcity.com[/url].  Thanks!
